DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety efficacy 5 second mitomycin-C ( MMC ) application photorefractive keratectomy ( PRK ) patient low myopia .
DOC.criteria: The inclusion criterion ablation depth less 65 Âµm , stable refractive error least 1 year correct distance visual acuity ( CDVA ) 0.1 LogMAR good . Patients keratoconus suspect , excessive dry eye , impair wound heal process , lenticular change , corneal dystrophy , history ocular surgery , anterior posterior uveitis , glaucoma retinal disease exclude .
